options.text: We have to stop the Kaibutsu's movements!

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, got it!
Here I go, [Player]!

Orbiter raised both hands to the sky,
causing a sphere of energy to appear.

name: Orbiter
text:
Gravity field, deploy!
—"Adventure"! Gravity Well!!

name: Engine-type Kaibutsu
text: —Ooooon...!

The fast-moving Kaibutsu were
sucked into Orbiter's gravity field.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, what an interesting technique.
It's not a direct attack, but a technique
that suppresses power with power—

name: Gaisei
text:
When such martial arts are displayed...
My blood also boils.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, the enemy's movements have dulled.
This is a "once-in-a-lifetime opportunity"!

name: Yotaro
text:
Please use your special move
on the Kaibutsu being sucked in,
without touching the gravity field!

Gaisei never took his eyes off the Kaibutsu.
With his back still turned to Yotaro,
he dashed off without a word.

He instantly closed the distance, dodging stray shots with
unpredictable, floating movements, and positioned himself
in front of the incoming Kaibutsu.

—And, as Gaisei's actions were predicted,
ViewPower was transmitted just as he attacked the enemy.

name: Yotaro
text: —Now, Gaisei-kun!

name: Gaisei
text:
I know.
—"Battle Blade",
Demon's Claw of Destruction, First Form!

options.text: Those two are perfectly in sync.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Leave that side to them,
I'll take care of the rest!
[Player], your ViewPower!

Just as Pubraseer said that,
he stepped forward and
drew his saber from its sheath.

Its blade, receiving the light,
grew brighter with a white glow.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Kaibutsu who devour human memories,
erasing even their very existence...
I won't let anyone forget them!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Friends, lend me your strength!
"Polaris",
Pénte Anamniseis!!

From the guard of Pubraseer's saber,
five lights rose.

They became a brilliant radiance that illuminated the surroundings,
and were powerfully unleashed towards the Kaibutsu.

name: Engine-type Kaibutsu
text: —Ooooon...!

A streak of light, with a fierce impact,
swept away all the attacking Kaibutsu.

options.text: Enemy presence has vanished from around us.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, safety seems to be secured for now.
I'm glad you're safe above all else.

Pubraseer sheathed his saber.
Then, he gently stroked the shining jewels
on its guard with his fingertips.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—[Player], thank you.
Thanks to you, I remembered what I wanted to be.
It is also an important part of... 'me'.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It's as if my friends are
fighting beside me, encouraging me on.
This feeling, it's very nostalgic.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Right after I became Captain,
everyone pushed me on when I was struggling.
It's the same as that time...

With a small wry smile,
Pubraseer grasped the compass-shaped
Parallel Weapon in his hand.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...For the sake of everyone who calls me leader,
I will use this power.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Besides, I too have grown as both a
Captain and a hero since then,
so I must prove myself!

Pubraseer showed a pure smile on his face.
Just then, Denebola and Orbiter each ran towards him.

options.text: Denebola, thank you for the guerrilla attack!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Denebola
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I've finished dealing with my side.
I came to assist... but it seems like it's already over.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Orbiter
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, leave it to me!
I'll help out with whatever I can!

name: Orbiter
text:
Denebola, you were also
alright, weren't you?
I'm glad...

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, all the Kaibutsu around the entrance
have been defeated.

Confirming there were no enemies nearby,
Denebola turned to [Player] and the others.

name: Denebola
text:
[Player], Pubraseer, I'd like to report.
It is clear that the Kaibutsu were
heading towards the "Pillar of Light".

name: Denebola
text:
Thanks to their pathing,
most of them were intercepted...
But, I can't shake off this ominous feeling.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Right.
I also noticed one thing.

Yotaro and Gaisei also confirmed
that there were no Kaibutsu and had gathered here.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Those Kaibutsu.
They have a strange smell.
Different from normal Kaibutsu-

name: Yotaro
text:
It's like, a bland-tasting
'something' with a hint flavor from a
Kaibutsu, is what I'm trying to say.

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player], are those not
the Kaibutsu's main bodies?

options.text: Yeah, I felt something was off too.
You have amazing observation skills, Yotaro-kun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, t-thank you very much...
It's a little embarrassing when you say that directly...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, being acknowledged by you, [Player], it doesn't feel half bad.
...Hehe.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Split bodies, huh?
So, those Kaibutsu must also have
a stronger main body somewhere.

name: Gaisei
text:
Hehehe... It's getting
a little fun, isn't it?

name: Yotaro
text:
Hmm...
I don't know if it's stronger,
Gaisei-kun.

Yotaro adjusted his glasses
and activated his terminal.

name: Yotaro
text:
There was a weak Kaibutsu
we encountered earlier,
that ran away, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
Split bodies should be identical to the main one.
If, that escaped Kaibutsu is the main body...
And if you think about it that way—

name: Yotaro
text:
It can also be assumed that it's
hiding while making its split bodies
do the predation... biding its time.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Kaibutsu, acting in such a way...?
I thought they simply attacked people...

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, fundamentally, I also think the same.
...However, since a special individual exists,
there must be more reason to it.

name: Yotaro
text:
I can't be sure yet,
but it seems to be related
to the Kaibutsu's true nature.

name: Gaisei
text:
...However, "Observer".
Even weak individuals can gather
and become gigantic—

name: Gaisei
text:
Even [Player]-dono
struggles against them...
Was that right?

At Gaisei's words,
[Player] nodded.

name: Denebola
text:
...Ah, it seems we can't
just leave them alone
just because they're weak now.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, that's right. If the split bodies
are gathering at the "Pillar of Light",
then the main body must be there.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, [Player]...
...We're still going to proceed further
into the "Pillar of Light", right...?

Orbiter walked closer to [Player]'s side,
and sadly gazed at the authentication gate.

options.text: It might be dangerous, but we have to go.

name: Orbiter
text:
Right, that's right... you know, I—
...Eh, C-Captain!
L-Look, those...!

Orbiter, who was about to say something,
frantically pointed at the split bodies that had lost their pseudo-cores
and were disappearing into specks of light.

And in the place where the light receded,
several unconscious people laid on the ground.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—T-These are!
Their breathing... good.
They seem to be stable.

Pubraseer, who rushed over,
checked the condition of the unconscious people one by one.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
They don't seem to have any major injuries, but...
My friends, please help them.

Pubraseer poured his wish into
the compass-shaped Parallel Weapon.

In response, a domain filled with
faint light expanded, enveloping the people.

name: Denebola
text:
—Hm?
I know this person...!
It's my assigned examiner!

name: Orbiter
text:
Is that the person Denebola said disappeared
when he looked away for a moment...?
But, what are they doing here...?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...And, it seems the Operator
who explained my duties
to me is also here.

name: Yotaro
text:
This person has an ID card around their neck.
Their affiliation is... 'Warp System Control Room'?

At Yotaro's words,
[Player] and the others showed expressions of surprise.

options.text: It's the person who went incommunicado...!
As expected, it was the Kaibutsu's work, huh?

text:
Just then, [Player]'s
terminal announced an incoming call.

name: Monomasa
text:
—[Player].
It seems you don't have much time on your hands.
I did also send you a message.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I can mostly picture it.
But it does seem that you're safe for now.
First, let me report on the situation.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The four of us are safe.
This is no longer a vacation, but...
First, let me report on the situation.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Monomasa
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The four of us are safe.
This is no longer a vacation, but...
First, let me report on the situation.

name: Monomasa
text:
We are heading towards the "Pillar of Light"
while dealing with the Kaibutsu and
conducting rescue operations.

name: Yoshiori
text:
I've heard about it from the President.
...Well, if Kaibutsu appear,
we'll have no choice but to fight them anyway.

name: Exio
text:
They also contacted us, saying they managed
to escape from the observation area.
We should be able to meet up soon.

name: Melide
text:
[Player], you're caught in
a warp system malfunction,
is what I heard...

options.text: That's been resolved, so it's fine!

text:
[Player] briefly explained
the current situation.

name: Exio
text:
...I see.
Kaibutsu have already
appeared there too.

name: Exio
text:
It seems my prediction
was correct.

name: Yoshiori
text:
They're swarming over here too.
But, they're all split bodies.

name: Monomasa
text:
I was observing the Kaibutsu' behavior,
and it seems that the predated split bodies
will immediately flee towards the "Pillar of Light".

name: Monomasa
text:
...And, larger individuals than
the larvae have started appearing.
They must have been maturing.

name: Exio
text:
Let's prioritize the protection
of civilians in our actions.

name: Melide
text:
...[Player] too, please be careful.
We'll be heading there soon.

options.text: Melide and everyone, be careful too.

text:
Ending the communication with the four,
[Player] turned around.

Yotaro and Gaisei were a little distance away,
seemingly whispering to each other.

name: Yotaro
text:
—Gaisei-kun, while we're at it,
I'll look for a way to disable
the authentication system.

name: Yotaro
text:
As villains, we absolutely must avoid
leaving a huge trail of information...

name: Gaisei
text:
What a confusing thing you said just now.
I can just slice such a thing with just my arm.

name: Yotaro
text:
U-Uhm, the repair costs...
But honestly, the more I investigate,
the tighter the security is.

name: Yotaro
text:
It might be difficult without
a very skilled hacking technique...
But I'll do what I can, so help me out.

name: Gaisei
text:
How troublesome...
Hurry up, "Observer".
If I get bored, I'll just slice it.

As Yotaro frantically typed on his terminal,
Denebola approached, side-eyeing him.

name: Denebola
text:
It seems alright to leave them alone.
...Hey, [Player], and Pubraseer.

name: Denebola
text:
According to the earlier conversation,
the main body of the Kaibutsu should be
somewhere in this "Pillar of Light", right?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, if the split bodies are
heading here after being predated,
then it's natural to assume so.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Surely, they too were brought here
by the Kaibutsu after being predated somewhere.

Pubraseer and Denebola gazed
at the unconscious Operators.

name: Denebola
text:
I see, in that case,
we need to go further inside
to defeat the Kaibutsu, but—

name: Denebola
text:
We'll also need to protect these people.
I suggest we act separately.
...I'll stay behind.

options.text: Will you be alright on your own...?

name: Denebola
text:
With this many people,
I could probably carry them and run,
but those who are unconscious should be kept still.

name: Denebola
text:
And if any of the examiners wake up,
depending on their condition,
we might be able to ask them for an operation.

name: Denebola
text:
Our transformation should also last for a while,
and reinforcements are also coming our way, right?

Pubraseer nodded at
Denebola's suggestion.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...That's right.
Denebola, you should be fine.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
However, please keep in touch
with us at all times.
...I'm counting on you.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
............
And, Orbiter.
Could you also stay here?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
From here on, it will be too dangerous
for you, who isn't used to fighting.
I'm worried about you. Do you understand?

At Pubraseer's words,
Orbiter quietly looked down.
Then, he tightly clenched his fists.

name: Orbiter
text:
—Astronauts, no matter how dangerous it is,
are always with their Captain...

Orbiter, who muttered in a small, strained voice,
looked up and desperately continued speaking.

name: Orbiter
text:
...I'll never give up!
I, too, as an astronaut,
will go with Captain!

name: Orbiter
text:
Please, Captain, let me come with you!
...I have nothing else—
'Nothing else'...!

options.text: Orbiter, may I ask you why?
Why are you so insistent on being an astronaut?

text:
Orbiter swallowed quietly.
Then, bracing himself,
he gazed at [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
...My body is,
as Denebola says, you know...

name: Orbiter
text:
Actually, inside this suit,
...there's no one.
I know that too...

name: Orbiter
text:
—But, I am a human.
My body... might be different from
everyone else's, but that's the truth!

As if about to burst into tears,
Orbiter desperately struggled to speak.

name: Orbiter
text:
I don't remember anything
before coming to the moon...
I don't even know my real name.

name: Orbiter
text:
Andrew and the others,
found me in space while
they were working, they said...

name: Orbiter
text:
...Before I knew it,
everyone was calling me 'Orbiter'.

While Orbiter's voice may be trembling,
even so, he continued to speak, trying
not to give in to the fear overflowing from within him.

name: Orbiter
text:
I don't remember anything, so in my place,
they investigated various things about me,
and I'm really happy about that, but—

name: Orbiter
text:
My body is different from everyone else's...
I don't get hungry, and I don't get sleepy.

name: Orbiter
text:
...The more I investigated,
the more I realized I was different.
I realized that I 'wasn't human'...!

Orbiter desperately cried out,
a scream that felt like it would tear him apart.

—Even so, no tears came.
He couldn't shed a single drop.

name: Orbiter
text:
...So, I...
I pretended to be like everyone else.
It was a bad thing, but... I lied.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Actually, I knew it all along.
They took me to a place that they said was a hospital,
but it was always a research institute—

name: Orbiter
text:
And... when they turned off my body's power,
the doctors said they gave me anesthetic.

name: Orbiter
text:
To make me think like I was a human...
They were telling me kind lies.

Pubraseer, without a word, had already
embraced Orbiter with his arms.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Orbiter, you must have been scared.
And, I had left you to suffer all this time.
Thank you for telling me everything.

name: Orbiter
text:
...U-Uuugh...!
Captain, I, I...!
Waaahhh...!!

Clinging desperately,
Orbiter let out emotions
that couldn't be put into words.

Pubraseer gently enveloped
his hard spacesuit body,
accepting him as he is.

Denebola also approached Orbiter,
and awkwardly extended his hand.

name: Denebola
text:
Sorry, Orbiter...
It was something you were very much concerned about,
...and I ended up asking something unpleasant.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Uhm, no, it's okay.
I didn't like to hide it all the time either...

name: Orbiter
text:
...I, knowing nothing about myself,
was looking for my birthplace,
a place to return to.

name: Orbiter
text:
So, I made a spaceship by hand,
and tried my best to go to the space
where I was found...

name: Orbiter
text:
If I told Andrew and the others,
I thought it would make them worry...
So I secretly prepared...

[Player] gently stroked
Orbiter's head.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Thank you, [Player].
Thanks to you, I've calmed down... a little.
I'm sorry for making you worry...

name: Orbiter
text:
I... remember just a little bit.
Someone's words that make me feel nostalgic—

name: Orbiter
text:
「In my place, I want you to travel
the vast cosmos」, was what they said.
...That's all I could remember.

Orbiter slowly moved his body away
from [Player] and the others.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Therefore, to 'become an astronaut'
is absolutely my dream.

name: Orbiter
text:
My desire to become an astronaut
is unwavering and true... And that alone
is what I believe in about myself.

name: Orbiter
text:
...But, that's all there is.
I could remember nothing else.

name: Orbiter
text:
—If I'm not an astronaut,
I'll become 'empty'.

And, he looked at
[Player] and Pubraseer.

name: Orbiter
text:
...So, please.
Captain, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
I 'want to be an astronaut'.
No matter how dangerous, I want to be with you, Captain.
—Please, take me with you too.

Orbiter, who muttered in a small, strained voice,
looked up and desperately continued speaking.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
I understand your feelings.
Could you, give me a moment to speak?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I feel the same way.
However, Orbiter's resolve is real.
Could you, give me a moment to speak?

text:
At Orbiter's honest words,
Pubraseer also gazed back at Orbiter
with clear eyes.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Looking at you,
I'm reminded of my old self,
who aimed for space without knowing fear.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Orbiter, to you who bravely spoke,
I also want to tell you about myself.

With a gentle yet dignified voice,
Pubraseer continued.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
A long time ago,
during a journey through space,
we were attacked by Kaibutsu—

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text: I... lost my precious comrades.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
As the captain, as a comrade myself.
...I would never want anyone
to bear that sorrow again.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—So, promise me.
If you intend to proceed together with us,
...you will not overdo yourself.

To the serious-faced Pubraseer,
Orbiter also clenched his fists tightly
and nodded firmly.

name: Orbiter
text:
—I promise, Captain.
I will absolutely obey Captain's instructions.

At those words, Pubraseer
smiled gently in return.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Ah, thank you.
I shall be relying heavily on your strength.
Just as you helped me along the way.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
[Player], what do you think?
Orbiter has trusted us and
shared something important with us.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I want to respond to Orbiter's—
My friend's, feelings.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I want to push him forward
as he pursues his dream.

At Pubraseer's words,
[Player] also nodded.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Thank you, [Player].
I promise to protect you all
at all costs.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Sorry, Denebola.
I'll be leaving it all to you,
so please take care of them.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, that was my intention all along.
Leave this side to me.
—Orbiter, do your best.

At Denebola's words,
Orbiter nodded in return.
Just then...

name: Yotaro
text:
G-Gaisei-kun!
...Wait, just a little longer!
I might find out in just a bit—

name: Yotaro
text: —Ah, the repair costs—!!

From behind, Yotaro's scream and
the sound of rubble collapsing could be heard.

name: Denebola
text:
...Well, it seems that the
gate has been opened.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Hmm... I can't condone
destroying the gate, but...
For now, let's just proceed.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
[Player], Orbiter.
Let's head there as well.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Yeah!
Let's go, [Player]!
We have to defeat the Kaibutsu!

options.text: Denebola, I'm counting on you over there!

text:
The three nodded to each other and
ran towards the gate where the two villains were.

Denebola watched them go,
then turned his gaze to the Operators
who were still unconscious.

name: Denebola
text:
...I guess I'll do my job.
First, I'll carry these guys
to a safe place— Hm?

Denebola found something
rolling at his feet and picked it up.

name: Denebola
text:
...This is Orbiter's
spaceship part, isn't it?

name: Denebola
text:
Speaking of which,
he left it behind, didn't he?
...I'll give it back to him later.

Chapter 6:
The Intersecting Cosmic Wake

name: Subaru
text:
—Hydoor-san,
get in front, I'll provide support.

name: Subaru
text:
—"Writing", Compilations of The Human Realm.
"At that moment, the Kaibutsu stopped moving!"

Subaru 'rewrote' the Kaibutsu's actions
with his fountain pen-shaped Parallel Weapon.

name: Engine-type Kaibutsu
text: -Vuooooh...!

name: Hydoor
text:
Nice, teach!
Now I'll blast them away myself!

name: Hydoor
text:
Don't get cocky, you punks!
—"Swift Swim"! Okeanós tou Drákos!

A surging torrent of water, rising like a giant dragon,
fiercely pierced the motionless Kaibutsu.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Phew, did I get them all?
Tch. Kaibutsu, always making me waste my time—

name: Subaru
text:
Hydoor-san!
Behind you!!

name: Hydoor
text:
—Agh!?
Damn it, are they still spawning!?
You saved me, teach.

name: Subaru
text:
...Honestly, be careful.
I know you're exhausted from back-to-back battles,
but you're letting your guard down.

name: Subaru
text:
If you have time to complain,
then move your body.
...That's your forte, isn't it?

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph, you're telling me.
Even though you always make me
do all the work— Yaah!!

name: Subaru
text:
It's about playing to one's strengths.
—I'll do my job accordingly.
"Again, the torrent attacks the Kaibutsu."

The two defeated the surrounding Kaibutsu,
but they were still slowly being closed in on.

More in number than they could defeat,
with tremendous momentum, the Kaibutsu
continued to surge towards them.

name: Subaru
text:
...Finally, we're near the "Pillar of Light",
but it's full of Kaibutsu, isn't it?

Subaru checked his Parallel Weapon.
The ink in his fountain pen
had begun to fade slightly.

name: Subaru
text:
...At this rate,
if we keep consuming ViewPower,
it seems it will run out first.

name: Hydoor
text:
If our techniques become unusable
while we're surrounded like this,
that's seriously bad news...!

Cold sweat streamed down
Hydoor's forehead.
Just then-

name: Justice
text:
—"Thunderbolt",
Gigabolt Breaker!!

With a fierce thunderclap,
a flash of light sliced through
all the surrounding Kaibutsu at once.

name: Justice
text:
Hahahaha!!
Did I keep you waiting, heroes!!!
You're safe now!!!!

name: Sui
text:
W-We finally caught up...
Are you two alright?

name: Mokdai
text:
Subaru-san, Hydoor-san!
We'll assist you too!

name: Akashi
text:
Justice is too fast...!
...No, this isn't the time
to be saying that!

name: Akashi
text:
Alright, I'm fired up!
From now on, don't hesitate
to rely on us!

name: Huckle
text:
—Most of the surrounding
Kaibutsu are split bodies.

name: Huckle
text:
There's a possibility that
civilians have been harmed.
Prioritize rescue operations.

name: Crowne
text:
Alright, leave it to me!
Now, you Kaibutsu—
Not a single one of you will escape!

name: Subaru
text:
Everyone from Parallel Flight Inc.
...To think that reinforcements would arrive at this time.

name: Flamier
text:
We will also provide our support.
Andrew, let's go!

name: Andrew
text:
Yes, My Lady.
Please leave this to me!

Eight more members joined the formation
of Hydoor and Subaru at once.

Like fish in water,
the heroes turned the tide of the situation.

...Oh.
It seems we're a little late.

name: Melide
text:
Is everyone safe?
...Monomasa, let us join the battle too.

name: Monomasa
text:
Ah, that's right.
Let's go, Yoshiori.
It seems there are endless enemies.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Hmph, good.
We're doing this on our day off,
so let's crush them all!

Then, four more
heroes joined them.

Many ViewPowers gathered,
and the ink in Subaru's fountain pen
regained its radiance.

name: Subaru
text:
M-More reinforcements...!
That was helpful.
...is what I'd like to say, but.

name: Subaru
text:
To think I'd meet you here.
I'm starting to dislike myself for not
being able to wholeheartedly rejoice.

name: Exio
text:
Oh, I seem to be quite disliked.
—Long time no see,
Nobeyama Subaru-sensei.

name: Exio
text:
'Fortunately', we are now on the same side as heroes.
It is an honor to cooperate with you,
from the bottom of my heart.

name: Subaru
text:
...I see.
I'll take that as a yes.
As long as you belong to that agency, that is.

name: Subaru
text:
Honestly...
Truth is stranger than fiction,
as they say.

name: Hydoor
text:
Enough with the nonsense!
If we have more people, that's great, isn't it!?
-Alright, let's do this, Akashi!

name: Akashi
text:
Oh yeah!
Let's go smash them!

Hydoor ran with Akashi.
Behind them, Subaru prepared to
provide support, and asked a question himself.

name: Subaru
text:
...By the way, everyone.
Have you seen Pubraseer-san anywhere?

name: Subaru
text:
Originally, we were on the same team,
but with the intruders and Kaibutsu commotion,
we've barely been able to meet up.

name: Subaru
text:
I heard he was with [Player],
so I thought he was with all of you.

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, the two of them
should be inside the "Pillar of Light" now.
We are also heading there to support them.

name: Subaru
text:
...I see, thank you.
I don't quite understand the circumstances,
but I've got it now.

name: Subaru
text:
Then, that's convenient.
—Let's quickly take care of things here,
and go meet them together.

—Archimedes Colony.
"Pillar of Light" upper floor,
Ceremony Hall.

A few hours ago, it was filled with heroes,
but now, no one could be seen.

[Player] and the others ran
up the deserted venue, aiming for the upper floors.

options.text: Everyone, the Kaibutsu's presence is getting stronger.
...The main body seems to be further up.

name: Yotaro
text:
That seems to be the case.
...However, [Player].
I also smell some Kaibutsu nearby.

name: Yotaro
text:
-No, this scent is...
It's the split bodies'.
We should be vigilant about our surroundings.

name: Gaisei
text:
Hehe, the Kaibutsu we fight along the way
are gradually growing stronger.

name: Gaisei
text:
It's a bit monotonous, but compared to before,
it seems to be somewhat more enjoyable now.

name: Yotaro
text:
It's just a guess,
but I think the split bodies
are also combining.

Without stopping,
Yotaro checked the replay of
previous battles saved on his terminal.

name: Yotaro
text:
I was thinking about the Kaibutsu's objective.
If the weaker individuals hide and generate split bodies-

name: Yotaro
text:
Their priority should be to ensure their own safety.
However, the split bodies are relatively belligerent...

name: Yotaro
text:
From that, what can be inferred is that
they make the split bodies prey on humans,
and transport the obtained energy to the main body.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Indeed, if that's the case, the logic would fit.
It can safely become a stronger adult form...
Is that it?

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, that's right.
...Well, of course,
it's just a hypothesis.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, Yotaro.
If that story is true,
what would that mean?

name: Yotaro
text:
Right...
Currently, a large number of split bodies
seem to have appeared around the "Pillar of Light".

name: Yotaro
text:
If all of them were to combine—
The disastrous situation that [Player]
mentioned would be created.

name: Gaisei
text:
...If that's the case,
it seems more enjoyable to
let them swim freely for now—

name: Engine-type Kaibutsu
text: Vu, oooooh...!!

Suddenly, a Kaibutsu attacking
from behind a shadow was cut down by Gaisei's blade.

name: Gaisei
text:
Unfortunately, the opponent seems to have no patience.
Should they challenge me,
I would have no choice but to cut them down.

name: Orbiter
text:
That's not quite what 'having no patience' means, I think...
Besides, Gaisei, you of all people are saying that.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
But, to scatter them with a single swing is impressive, as expected.
Not only the speed of his reaction,
but also the sharpness of his honed technique can be felt.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Well, well, Pubraseer-dono.
To my immature technique, that is an honor beyond measure.

Gaisei swung his arm,
brushed off the dirt,
and replied with utmost politeness.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
You don't need to be modest.
This is the strength you've built,
and the form of your 'dream'.

At those words, Gaisei
reacted for just a moment,
then grinned again.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, I see.
That's why you are a 'hero'.

name: Gaisei
text:
...I wish to engage in battle with you
as soon as possible.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I'll accept that challenge when the time comes.
But, at the very least, that will be after this
Kaibutsu commotion has completely settled down.

Pubraseer and Gaisei looked
at the door at the end of the hallway,
in the direction they were heading.

On the door [Player] pointed to,
the words "System Control Room"
were written.

name: Gaisei
text:
Ah, finally!
Then, without restraint, let us
enjoy ourselves to the fullest...!

Gaisei ignored the obvious 'No Entry' sign like
it was never there, and tried to open the door.
However-

name: Orbiter
text:
It seems like a security zone, doesn't it?
Since it's the control room, it's an important place,
so of course it would be like that...

name: Gaisei
text:
...Haa, it's disappointing.
Another door that won't open.
How many times do I have to repeat this farce?

name: Gaisei
text:
"Observer", I can open it.
We can't waste any more time.

Just as Gaisei said that,
and prepared his Parallel Weapon.

name: Yotaro
text:
-Hehehe.
How about that, Gaisei-kun?
I opened it with a legitimate method.

Yotaro twirled an ID card for the 'Warp System Control Room'
on his fingertip, an ID card they had seen somewhere before.

options.text: You just took it without permission!?
His efficiency is that of a villain...

name: Yotaro
text:
It's an emergency, you see.
I borrowed it a little, thinking
it might be necessary.

name: Yotaro
text:
It's like "forewarned is forearmed".
How about it, was it useful?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Normally, I'd have a lot of questions, but...
It is indeed an emergency, that's true.

name: Yotaro
text:
Indeed, it would be a problem if I,
a villain, were holding it,
so I'll return this to you.

Yotaro casually handed
the ID card to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Orbiter
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you haven't done anything wrong,
I don't think you'd be suspected...
Do you have any idea why?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't worry. Besides the ID,
there are many things to report...
At that time, I'll testify with you.

options.text: I'll hold onto it for you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I'm sorry, but please hold onto it.
There's a possibility that I might lose it
if I get caught in a battle.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
But, for now, we can pass with this.
Let's hurry on ahead.

name: Orbiter
text:
—So this is the control room.
It's full of machines, somehow...

Unlike the glamorous ceremony hall,
the interior, devoid of ornamentation,
was lined with gigantic computers.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It seems that Kaibutsu must have appeared here.
There are traces of them in various places.

Pubraseer looked around.
Control panels and monitors lay scattered,
left in disarray.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Glass shards are also scattered around...
Did the Kaibutsu break them?

name: Yotaro
text:
No, the larvae Kaibutsu cannot
interfere physically.

name: Yotaro
text:
Surely, when they tried to escape from the Kaibutsu,
the surrounding objects must have fallen over.

name: Gaisei
text:
There don't seem to be any Kaibutsu here.
Then, we have no business here anymore.
Let's proceed, [Player]-dono.

options.text: Let's send the information to Crowne.

text:
On the monitor of the most damaged
computer, numerous errors and numbers
and symbols were continuously displayed.

Photographing the situation,
[Player] sent it to Crowne.

name: Orbiter
text:
Because this machine broke,
[Player] was warping around
on their own?

name: Yotaro
text:
That possibility is high.
I'm not a specialist, so I don't know for sure,
but the remaining date does look like warp logs.

name: Yotaro
text:
[Player].
Wouldn't it be a good idea to send
this data along with it too?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...It's not something to be thanked for.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...But, aren't you guys a little lenient towards villains?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I think you should be more careful.
...Well, I'm the one saying this, even though you've been helping me all this time.

Yotaro shook his head slightly in embarrassment.
Then, he continued saying "Besides".

options.text: ...Is it okay for you to help me?

name: Yotaro
text:
If there were a problem, even if Gaisei-kun asked,
I wouldn't have come this far with you.

name: Yotaro
text:
We have our own objectives,
but I don't dislike you, not at all.

Yotaro turned his gaze
towards [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player], I've heard about you from Gaisei-kun.
That you are a very capable— "Observer".

name: Yotaro
text:
I'll tell you one of my objectives.
...I wanted to know
your power as an "Observer".

name: Yotaro
text:
...I can't tell you the reason yet.
Information is very valuable, you see.
I'll hold back as much as possible.

name: Yotaro
text:
...However, if you're also an "Observer",
you should have some idea.

Yotaro cut off the conversation there, then
turned his gaze to the hallway even further inside
the control room.

name: Yotaro
text:
...That's enough talk, [Player].
—There's a very strong presence here.

options.text: Could it be, the main body is beyond this...!

text:
At the words of [Player] and Yotaro,
the group braced themselves.

name: Gaisei
text:
I've been kept waiting for quite a while,
but finally, the feast has begun.
...My passion is also boiling.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, Captain, everyone!
There's a Kaibutsu!!

Just then, a Kaibutsu moved at high speed
in front of them, dissolving into nothingness
beyond the closed door.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-That seems to be a split body.
It'll be troublesome that it can pass
through doors and ignore physical interference...!

name: Orbiter
text:
Captain, what's in
that room ahead...?

Pubraseer quickly operated his terminal,
checking the map information of the venue.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Beyond that is...
—W-What!?

Then, with a stunned expression,
he looked up.

name: Orbiter
text:
W-What's wrong, Captain?
You raised your voice...

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Beyond that is the bridge
connecting to the Ether Reactor's
control facility.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
It's the heart of this "Pillar of Light"... No,
the heart of the Archimedes Colony itself.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If Kaibutsu were to run wild there...
It would be the worst-case scenario.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Ah, however,
that place cannot be opened
with just an ID card.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It can't be helped, Gaisei.
Please destroy that door.
Time is of the essence, I shall permit it.

name: Gaisei
text:
If Pubraseer-dono wishes it,
I shall demonstrate my skill.
Is that alright, "Observer"?

name: Yotaro
text:
I-If permission has been given...!
[Player], please explain that it's
not our responsibility afterwards!

Yotaro shouted that,
and then transmitted ViewPower
to Gaisei.

name: Gaisei
text:
A door of this magnitude is easy.
—"Battle Blade",
Demon's Claw of Destruction, First Form!

The moment the thick steel door,
with its many layers, was cut open—

A tremendous Kaibutsu presence
flooded the surroundings.

A large number of Kaibutsu were gathering
at the energy body in the center of the facility—
the Ether Reactor.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Guh!
What a taste and smell...!

options.text: The Kaibutsu's main body is in there...!
T-There are so many of them!?

name: Orbiter
text:
...K-Kaibutsu are gathering at the reactor!?
W-What should we do, Captain!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Orbiter, calm down
and deal with this.
Act with me!

name: Yotaro
text:
[Player], first, I'll operate
to reduce the number of Kaibutsu
as much as possible.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun!
Absolutely, absolutely, do not
attack the reactor, you hear me!?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Are you mocking me,
dear "Observer"?

name: Gaisei
text:
I understand what will happen if I cut that.
Besides, I have no interest in such things.

name: Gaisei
text:
—This number, and overwhelming power.
Isn't this just splendid...!
It certainly seems enjoyable, above all!

name: Gaisei
text:
Come now, [Player]-dono!
Let us dance together!
Battle Start
